Restaurants on Mission is a foundation that aims to provide a step towards a better life for people completing reformation and reintegration programs through nonprofit restaurants.

The identity system and various assets were created, in addition to a digital campaign for the launch of their first restaurant in Medellin, Colombia.

© 2021 Jamus Marquette.

  • Email
  • Instagram

Jamus is a conceptually driven, tech-savvy, multidisciplinary graphic and motion designer, creative thinker, and problem solver interested in creating original, unexpected, and intelligent design that communicates authentic ideas and stories, and creates purposeful and meaningful experiences that advance goals, touch hearts, provoke the use of heads, and charm eyes.

His talents have been developed at SpotCo under the art direction of Gail Anderson, designing at RED Partners on a wide range of projects including branding, book design, book covers, posters, environmental graphics, event graphics, web, and motion graphics for various clients, creating award winning theater posters with Kevin Brainard of Area of Practice, and as a freelance designer and consultant while living abroad developing and broadening his character and cultural perspective volunteering.

Education

School of Visual Arts
BFA Graphic Design
2008

Awards and Recognition

  • TDC57 Winner
  • TDC56 Winner
  • The Rhodes Family Award for Outstanding Achievement in Graphic Design, SVA
  • The Boyzzz Scholarship Award—Motion Graphics Achievement Award, SVA
  • Works preserved in the AIGA Design Archives
  • Works featured in Art Directors Club Student Exhibition
  • Silas H. Rhodes Scholarship, SVA
  • Top 10 Portfolio and Deans List, SVA

Publication

  • Graphic Style Lab: Develop Your Own Style with 50 Hands-On Exercises, by Steven Heller
  • Design Firms Open for Business, by Steven Heller and Lita Talarico
  • Typography 32
  • The Language of Graphic Design: An Illustrated Handbook for Understanding Fundamental Design Principles, by Richard Poulin
  • Typography 31
  • AIGA Design Archives
  • CMYK Magazine’s Call For Aspiring Creatives #43
  • Visual Literacy: A Conceptual Approach to Graphic Problem Solving, by Richard Wilde and Judith Wilde.
